amendment.description: Amendment increases the EPA's Inspector General fund by $10,038,000 and decreases the Environmental Protection Agency's (EPA) Environmental Programs and Management fund by $14,000,000.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 15 printed in House Report 114-683 to increase the EPA's Inspector General fund by $10,038,000 to bring up to President's request and decreases the Environmental Protection Agency's (EPA) Environmental Programs and Management fund by $14,000,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lummis amendment (A014) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Lummis amendment (A014) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A014) offered by Mrs. Lummis.
